meta.comment: Boiled cider has been reduced to about 1/5 its original volume, yielding a syrup. This is an ingredient in cooking or used like maple syrup. It also may be reconsituted, allowing it to function as a preservation method for cider

steps.step: Put cider in a wide pan.
Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to keep just at a boil.
Boil until cider reduces to about 1/6 its original volume and measures 219.
Remove from heat and filter through a coffee filter or paper towel.
Transfer to canning jars and seal.
